revision.comment: /* 5 inch guns */ add response to IP about chronology, ping Tomandjerry
revision.text:
{{Talkheader}} {{ArticleHistory | action1 = GAN | action1date = 00:28, 1 July 2015 (UTC) | action1link = Talk:USS Colorado (BB-45)/GA1 | action1result = listed | action1oldid = 669411204 | action2 = GAR | action2date = 23:16, 9 July 2015 (UTC) | action2link = Talk:USS Colorado (BB-45)/GA2 | action2result = kept |dykdate=23 July 2015 |dykentry= ... that '''[[USS Colorado (BB-45)|USS ''Colorado'' (BB-45)]]''' ''(pictured)'' survived two ''[[kamikaze]]'' hits during the [[Battle of Leyte Gulf]]? | currentstatus = GA | topic = Warfare }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WPMILHIST|class=GA|B1=no|B2=no|B3=yes|B4=yes|B5=yes|Maritime=yes|US=yes|WWII=yes|OMT=1}} {{WikiProject Ships|class=GA|B1=no|B2=no|B3=yes|B4=yes|B5=yes|importance=Mid}} {{WikiProject United States|class=GA|importance=Low|CO=Yes|CO-importance=Mid}} }}
==Website==
I found a website dedicated to this ship.
http://www.usscolorado.org/History/history.htm
Might it be of any use to the article?
[[Special:Contributions/96.243.206.236|96.243.206.236]] ([[User talk:96.243.206.236|talk]]) 04:21, 11 December 2009 (UTC)
==5 inch guns== Friedman, on p 368 of US Battleships says the 5in/25 were not replaced by 5in/38 but only shielded. The photographs on that page seem to bear this out. Anyone have a definitive answer?
[[User:Subspace1250|Subspace1250]] ([[User talk:Subspace1250|talk]]) 06:49, 30 December 2010 (UTC)
==Chronology== Early WWII chronology appears garbled. [[Special:Contributions/71.83.153.74|71.83.153.74]] ([[User talk:71.83.153.74|talk]]) 20:45, 15 September 2015 (UTC) : G'day, yes specifically "The work was completed by 31 March 1942..." sentence appearing after "On 31 May, she and Maryland patrolled near Golden Gate Bridge to protect San Francisco from any Japanese attack...". I attempted to fix this while copyediting this article previously, but it was changed back with this edit: [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=USS_Colorado_%28BB-45%29&type=revision&diff=670433627&oldid=670352414]. I am not certain why it was reverted, but will not make the change again as I potentially got it wrong. I will ping the GA nominator. {{ping|User:Tomandjerry211}} G'day, are you able to address this issue? Cheers, [[User:AustralianRupert|AustralianRupert]] ([[User talk:AustralianRupert|talk]]) 01:16, 28 September 2015 (UTC)
